articles.title: Exclusive: How a Russian billionaire shielded assets from sanctions - Reuters
articles.description: Russian businessman Andrey Melnichenko ceded control of two of the world's largest coal and fertilizers companies to his wife the day before he was sanctioned by the European Union, according to three people familiar with the matter.
